caption.p: Characterization of recombinant PR8 viruses in STAT2 –/– mice: groups of six-to-8-week-old C57BL/6 STAT2 –/– mice were infected intranasally with 10 6 PFU of the indicated recombinant PR8 viruses, or PBS as internal control. Mean body weight loss (A) and survival (B) are shown. Error bars represent SDs. (C) Viral titers in the lungs of animals infected with 10 6 PFU at days 2 and 4 post-infection. Symbols represent data from individual mice. Bars represent the means of lung viral titers. The black dotted lines indicates the limit of detection (100 FFU/ml). ∗ P ≤ 0.05 using Student’s t-test.
